snippet: President Obama is having increasingly frequent late-night dinners, here and abroad, with companions from fields like architecture, film, art and literature.
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama is having increasingly frequent late-night dinner parties, here and abroad, with companions from fields like architecture, film, art and literature; gatherings often carry over into Obama's day job, and his fund-raising, and guests are typically sympathetic to his political views.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is having increasingly frequent late-night dinners, here and abroad, with companions from fields like architecture, film, art and literature.

headline.main: At Dinner Tables, a Restless Obama Finds an Intellectual Escape
headline.print_headline: At Dinner Tables, a Restless Obama Finds an Intellectual Escape
